entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Baie-Comeau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:04 PM EST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -8.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Baie-Comeau Airport 12:00 AM EST Monday 16 January 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -8.0°C
Pressure: 103.1 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 69 %
Wind Chill: -14
Dewpoint: -12.7°C
Wind: NNE 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets beginning in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain in the afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 16. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Freezing rain or snow. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to snow after midnight. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. High minus 1. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 15 January 2023
